title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin compliments Russell Westbrook for adjusting to his role off the bench after a second straight win for the Lakers but warns against thinking this will continue to work long term. He's not buying the rumors that reigning Super Bowl Champion and Rams head coach Sean McVay will retire as they struggle to defend their championship. He also looks at the rise of the Dolphins after another big move at the trade deadline and what makes the NFL different from other pro leagues. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Mark Sanchez joins the show to breakdown why Jets QB Zach Wilson is underperforming.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
